Summer 2017 Camps

Summer camps at Miracle Fencing Club is an amazing opportunity for sabre fencers to train intensively in our brand new air conditioned facility under the guidance of our head coach Miracle. Campers will improve their physical conditions, strengthen their sabre footwork and bladework, and hone tactical skills through bouting and studying video recordings. Fun games also included!
Requirements:
  • Wear athletic clothing
  • Bring your own lunch and water
Dates (10am - 4pm everyday):
  • 6/26 - 6/30
  • 7/10 - 7/14
  • 7/24 - 7/28
  • 8/7 - 8/11
  • 8/21 - 8/25
Price:
  • Individual Membership: $280 ($200 for an additional family member)
  • (additional $70 for extension from 4pm to 6pm)
  • One Day (10am - 4pm): $60
Register Now!
